availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Medley (Union County, KY, merchant)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Forsyth Medley in Harrison County, Indiana, on August 24, 1837. Father of Margaret J. Medley, Nancy A. Medley, Lyman F. Medley, Henry C. Medley, John W. Medley, Sally Medley, and Annie Medley. Merchant in Union County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 539.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Iron County, Arcadia, p. 579B.
Indiana, U.S., Select Marriages Index, 1748-1993, Ancestry, Harrison County Marriages, Film 549383, p. 76.
"John Chrisostom Medley Sr. (1815-1892)," Find A Grave, Memorial 61168060, accessed November 12, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/61168060.
